H0.text: Cayenne, after which the spicy condiment is named, is a city in which country. Brazil

H1.text: Cayenne, after which the spicy condiment is named, is a city in which country. Peru

H2.text: Cayenne, after which the spicy condiment is named, is a city in which country. Chile

H3.text: Cayenne, after which the spicy condiment is named, is a city in which country. GUF

A4.text: French Guiana is an overseas territory of France.

A5.text: Cayenne is a city in French Guiana.
